price: او په دې دنيا كې هم لعنت ورپسې شو او د قيامت په ورځ هم، بده بدله ده چې وركړې شوې.
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati bi'sa al-rif'du al-marfūdu
